name: Rhymove Dance Studio & School
about: Rhymove is a dance studio and school. Where we have world class instructor and their top rated and most valuable classes.
features: Rhymove is a full-stack project.
You can see our popular classes and top rated instructors.
You can select the classes that you want to purchase.
But If want to purchase a class you have to logged in first.
Once you are logged in you can select a class and you can see a Dashboard in the top after the classes page.
Once you select a class now you can purchase that class using cards ( Mastercard, Visa etc. ).
An admin could make you as an admin or instructor.
If you are a instructor you can add your own class and you can see your classes and the status of those classes.
If you are an Admin you can approve/deny/sent feedback of a class which is created by instructors.

name: Botboy - A Superheros Toy Marketplace
about: Botboy is a superhero toys marketplace where you can find verities of superhero toys.
features: This is a toy eCommerce website where you will find varieties of superhero toys.
In this project used firebase authentication system for login and registration as well as google login system is there.
You can see the flash sale for today feature.
If you want to see ty details you have to make sure that you are authenticated on not.
Once you are authenticated you can add a new toy for your own and only you can see these toys.
You can update and delete your toys.

name: Bistro Boss Restaurant
about: Bistro Boss Restaurant is a Full-Stack Web Application where you can find verities of food items.
features: This is a Full-Stack web application.
You can add a particular food item to your cart.
You can purchase these food items by card ( Mastercard, Visa, etc. ).
This application has a dashboard. As an admin of the application, you can see your current stats of the application.
You can create/update/delete a food item as an admin.
As an admin, you can manage users. You can delete or make the user an admin.

name: Dishtour Restaurant
about: Dishtour is a restaurant website that focused on their chefs. Chefs have some special recipes that I included in their detail page.
features: User can see the chefs of this testament and their especial recipes.

name: Cryptoverse
about: Cryproverse is a cryptocurrencies statistics website, where you can find information about various statistics of cryptocurrency coins and latest news relating to the Cryptooverse.
features: You will find latest stats of Cryptocurrency. For example: Total cryptocurrencies, total exchanges, total market capacity etc.
Brief overview of Cryptocurrency with chart.
You will be able to find the useful links for more information on Cryptocurrency.

name: Todo App
about: This is a complex todo application where I implemented the ReduxJS functionalities.
features: User can add/delete a task.
User can priorities a task by color.

name: Covid Stats
about: Covid Stats is a simple application that showcase the current covid stats.
features: User can see the latest statistics of COVID on a particular country.
